text: Antara Dua Darjat (English: Between Two Classes) is a 1960 Singaporean Malay- language black-and-white romantic melodrama. It was directed by and stars P. Ramlee and Saadiah. The story is about a couple in love who face obstacles because of their different social classes. Their families believe people of different ranks should not be together, leading to conflict and emotional turmoil. ==Songs== * Getaran Jiwa * Selamat Panjang Umur * Alunan Biola ==Related pages== * P. Ramlee filmography ==References== ==Other websites== * Antara Dua Darjat at the Cinema Malaysia * * Antara Dua Darjat / 1960 - Filem Malaysia
title: Antara Dua Darjat
